title: Hey there! I'm Thainá.
subtitle: Hey there! I'm a front-end developer with a passion for creating captivating web experiences. When I'm not coding, I'm immersed in virtual worlds and enchanted by romance novels. Cats hold a special place in my heart, and I'm always up for sharing adorable cat videos; Originally from João Pessoa, Paraiba, I now call Sobral, Ceará, my home. The past three years here have been an incredible adventure, embracing the vibrant culture and warm community.
